Question: In the movie 'Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!' released in 2008, which of the following statements are true regarding the character Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh?
Options:
A. Abhay Deol plays the character of Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh.
B. Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh is a supporting character in the film.
C. Abhay Deol is not involved in any heists in the movie.
D. Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh is the main protagonist of the film.
Answer: Abhay Deol plays the character of Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh., Lovinder 'Lucky' Singh is the main protagonist of the film.
